title: Metaphysics and Lore
description: Your guide across the Rainbow Bridge to metaphysical enlightenment, spiritual magic and psychic reading. It is a personal story that teaches metaphysics and explains everything about spirit guides, psychic reading, numerology, tarot, clairvoyance, astrology, meditation, crystals and stones, shamanism, runes, The Craft, and an understanding of Hell. It contains pictures of all 24 runes with complete descriptions of spiritual and magical uses for each one.
author: Shaman Vitki
